data.introduce: 证件信息提取服务是用于从主机中查询某客票旅客的证件信息。
data.functions: 根据票号旅客提取证件信息。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirTicketFoidRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"证件信息提取请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"零售商信息","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求商信息","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"请求者代码","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"主控航司","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"SecondFactor","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"双因素","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"第二因素代码。如CN，NI，PP，UU，ID，NM等。对应含义如下： NI（身份证）、PP（护照）、\n\t\t\t\t\t\tUU（无法识别的证件）、ID（士官证、军官证、武警警官证、海员证等）、CN（PNR）、NM（姓名）","children":[]},{"name":"@Value","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"第二因素值：1、当Code传NI、ID、UU、PP四种证件代码之一时，Value传SSR FOID或SSR DOCS录入的证件号； 2、当Code传CN时，Value则录入客票关联的订座记录编码； 3、当Code传NM时，Value传出票时使用的姓名。","children":[]}]},{"name":"@SysType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"C","description":"系统类型：系统类型: 默认值C(CRS)","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirTicketFoidRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"提取证件信息响应","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"警告详细信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误附加信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误附加信息","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误英文信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误中文信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Document","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"证件信息","children":[{"name":"@DocType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"证件类型","children":[]},{"name":"@DocID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"证件号","children":[]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"证件的序号","children":[]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -530 ","name":null,"msg":" Passenger information is empty ","msgZh":" 旅客信息为空 "},{"code":" -390 ","name":null,"msg":" IBE Service Error ","msgZh":" IBE服务异常 "},{"code":" -306 ","name":null,"msg":" too many concurrent request for service ","msgZh":" 访问频率限制 "},{"code":" -52300 ","name":null,"msg":" Please check the command parameters ","msgZh":" 请检查命令参数 "},{"code":" -52301 ","name":null,"msg":" Current ET Data:NO RECORD ","msgZh":" 当前ET数据无记录 "}]
